price: 31. „Taigi dabar mūsų Viešpaties Žodis buvo pateisintas prieš mus, kad mes tikrai (turime) paragautume (kančios).
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
